text: On their way back to their lands, the three Magi heard behind their backs the cry of the Devastation. More than one mother ran after them, caught up with them and cursed them. The news spread quickly, anyway. They marched between crisp fists and deaf re-criminations of men and women. At a crossroads they saw Joseph and Mary fleeing to Egypt with the Child. When they arrived in their respective countries, they were killed by remorse. FIN
title: Desastroso fin de los tres Reyes Magos
author: Marco Denevi
